casebody.data:
DOT
v.
STAGECOACH VILLAGE. No. 529PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 25, 2005. W. Richard Moore, Special Deputy Attorney General, Hilda Burnett-Baker, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Transportation. Bruce P. Ashley, Greensboro, for Stagecoach Village.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of May 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Stagecoach Village) shall have up to and including the 6th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of May 2005."
